[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1507576953754{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/single-resource-page-bg-colorol-1902×496.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1513287569960{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Accelerate Your Web Marketing

[vc_empty_space height=”30px” el_class=”sm-hide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1513287562657{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1513287590563{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”]

On Demand Webinar
Air Date: Wednesday, August 10, 2016
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px” el_class=”sm-hide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1514485414685{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156767″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1508351938963{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156769″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1508351953755{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”122876″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1509916202186{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

Jumpstart Your Web Marketing Tools

Learn how Accel, a conversion path optimization company, used SharpSpring’s web marketing tools to help a client double its site traffic and triple its conversion rates.

Accel’s client, FINSYNC – a cloud-based financial management platform – wasn’t seeing any ROI from its AdWords campaigns and didn’t have the resources to market more aggressively.Sound at all familiar?

By setting up SharpSpring on FINSYNC’s site, however, Accel was able to build a unique profile for every single web visitor, making it easy for FINSYNC to target its customers and prospects with the most relevant marketing content.

In this webinar, you’ll learn how to:

  • Use keywords and advanced targeting to drive more qualified traffic to your site
  • Reinforce your brand and amp up your conversion rates with remarketing campaigns
  • Set up personalized email drip campaigns and dynamic web content to keep your leads engaged

[/vc_column_text]

Featured Presenters:

John Rau

Founder - Accel Web Marketing

With over 10 years of marketing experience, John helps Accel’s clients leverage marketing tools like SharpSpring to increase sales without needing to increase their staff. A numbers-driven person, John believes strongly in properly tracking and measuring ROI of each marketing effort.

Keith McGibbon

Campaign Guru – Accel Web Marketing

Coming from a sales background, Keith knows what it takes to get someone to say yes - a skill that translates well into the marketing realm. Keith helps Accel’s customers run campaigns on Google, Facebook and LinkedIn and using SharpSpring to tie them all together.

Bryan Tobin

Training and Usability Manager – SharpSpring

As Usability Manager, Bryan is responsible for creating content to help users get the most out of SharpSpring. This includes maintaining the support forum and creating instructional “how to” videos. Working in collaboration with Marketing, Support, and Development, Bryan helps create an exemplary experience for every user.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1513287798595{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Watch it now

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy


[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
